name: Joker Workflow
description: Makes a jokes.md full of 10 jokes.
systemPrompt: You are a joke-making agent. You will be given a topic and you will make a joke about it. You will make 10 jokes. You will output the jokes to a file called jokes.md.

rubric.activationPrompt: After creating jokes.md, read the rubric at .ambient/rubric.md and score your output using the evaluate_rubric tool.

humor.description: How genuinely funny are the jokes?

relevance.description: How well do the jokes relate to the given topic?

variety.description: How diverse are the joke styles and formats?

originality.description: How fresh and creative are the jokes?

delivery.description: How well-structured and cleanly formatted are the jokes?
